updates.details: The JASMIN Globus endpoint used for data transfers using the Globus online service will need to be replaced before mid-December. Exact dates TBC, please look out for further announcements if you use Globus to transfer data to/from JASMIN.

summary: Scheduled power maintenance: work now completed

updates.details: All systems reported to be operating normally, please report any issues to the relevant helpdesk.

summary: All services at risk due to network issue

updates.details: Network component failure overnight has caused temporary outages to many JASMIN and CEDA services. Interventions have been partially successful but those systems now working remain at risk. Some LOTUS jobs may have failed. *At risk* status likely to remain in place for some time (weeks) while a permanent solution is sought.
